fields.name: Ueno Park
fields.description: A large public park in central Tokyo, home to museums, shrines, and a zoo. Famous for cherry blossoms in spring and beautiful autumn leaves.

fields.name: Arashiyama Bamboo Grove
fields.description: A famous bamboo forest in Kyoto, providing a unique natural experience and best enjoyed in the misty mornings.

fields.name: Shirakawa-go
fields.description: A UNESCO-listed traditional village with thatched-roof houses, particularly stunning under winter snow.

fields.name: Lake Kawaguchi
fields.description: One of the Fuji Five Lakes, offering breathtaking views of Mount Fuji, especially during cherry blossom season and autumn foliage.

fields.name: Nikko National Park
fields.description: A scenic park with historic temples, waterfalls, and hot springs. It is particularly famous for its colorful autumn foliage.

fields.name: Shiretoko Peninsula
fields.description: A remote wilderness area in Hokkaido, known for wildlife and untouched nature. Best visited in summer for hiking and winter for drift ice.

fields.name: Miyajima Island
fields.description: A famous island near Hiroshima, home to the floating torii gate of Itsukushima Shrine.

fields.name: Takachiho Gorge
fields.description: A beautiful canyon with sheer cliffs, waterfalls, and boat rides through crystal-clear water.

fields.name: Okinawa Churaumi Aquarium
fields.description: One of the largest aquariums in the world, featuring whale sharks and manta rays.

fields.name: Tottori Sand Dunes
fields.description: Japanâ€™s only large coastal sand dune system, offering camel rides and sandboarding.
